titles.title: A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Schonberg, et al. v. Sanders, et al.
A resolution to authorize representation by the Senate Legal Counsel in the case of Schonberg, et al. v. Sanders, et al.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel to represent Senators Lieberman, Lincoln, McConnell, McCain, and Sanders in the case of Schonberg, et al. v. Sanders, et al.
